title: Data-Driven Student Performance Prediction Modeling and AI-Enhanced Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: AI-based education program in smartphone-centric limited technology environments. Focus on strengthening competencies to build learner-level customized performance prediction models

learning_goals: Learners can design student performance prediction models using regression analysis and machine learning models.
Learners can analyze factors influencing academic performance using data visualization tools and write interpretation reports.
Learners can identify key features of predictive models by applying the Recursive Feature Elimination (RFE) technique.

resources: Open-source machine learning library (provided by instructor)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
